name: Vien
description:
take things slow and think, time your opportunities.

in Vien dodge asteroids as you plant trees by utilizing new vr mechanics such as the stretch cursor to direct and inverse orbital rotation to view the oriel.

original soundtrack by opendegree

inverse orbital rotation designed by opendegree

stretch cursor designed by spatialfree
